member.name: TF_LANGUAGEPROFILE
member.summary: The TF_LANGUAGEPROFILE structure contains information about a language profile.

member.name: TF_LANGUAGEPROFILE.clsid
member.summary: Specifies the class identifier of the text service within the language profile.

member.name: TF_LANGUAGEPROFILE.langid
member.summary: Specifies the language identifier of the profile.

member.name: TF_LANGUAGEPROFILE.catid
member.summary: Specifies the identifier of the category that the text service belongs to.

member.name: TF_LANGUAGEPROFILE.fActive
member.summary: A Boolean value, when TRUE, indicates that the language is activated.

member.name: TF_LANGUAGEPROFILE.guidProfile
member.summary: Specifies the identifier of the language profile.
